Name: Battle Imagine - Tempest Ogre
Description:
Activates or advances Tempest Ogre's Battle Imagine skill: Arcane! Thunderfall Grasp.

Arcane! Thunderfall Grasp
Summons Boss: Tempest Ogre to channel the power of thunder to generate a vortex, continuously pulling in enemies near the target and dealing AoE Magic Damage when the duration ends.
Description2: A crystallization of thoughts, consciousness, and Engram, possessing supernatural power. This principle has not been unraveled since the Bapharian civilization.
